transcript.text: This call may be recorded for quality and training purposes.
Thanks for calling Pivot Point Orthopedics. Part of pretty good AI. Am I speaking with Felix?
Got it. Can you please provide your date of birth?
Got It Felix? How may I help you today?
I would like to book an appointment at 8pm on a Tuesday.
Got it. What type of appointment do you need? For example, a new patient consultation, follow consultation procedure or physical therapy session.
I need a new patient consultation.
understood let me check if there are any new patient consultation, appointments available at 8:00 p.m. on a Tuesday
There are no openings at 8:00 p.m. on any upcoming Tuesday. Would you like to try a different time or a different day? Let me know your preference.
What is the earliest available appointment on a Tuesday?
Let me check for the earliest available. New patient consultation on a Tuesday. 1 moment. There are no available appointments on Tuesdays in the next week.
